label: Emergency Plumbing (Burst Pipe)
transcript: Hello! There's water spraying everywhere in my kitchen from under the sink! I can't find the stopcock, help!

label: Standard Mounting (TV)
transcript: Hi, I've got a new 65 inch OLED TV that I need wall mounted in the bedroom. It's a plasterboard wall.

label: Messy Multi-Task (Garden + Joinery)
transcript: Hi, I need someone to clear the weeds in my back garden and also fix a squeaky door in the hallway.

label: High-Value Landlord (Portfolio)
transcript: Good morning, I'm a property manager for 50 flats in Derby. We need a reliable handyman for ongoing reactive maintenance.

label: Electrical Hazard (Flickering)
transcript: My lights are flickering and there is a burning smell near the fuse box under the stairs.

label: Furniture Assembly (PAX)
transcript: I've got 4 IKEA PAX wardrobes that need building. Can you give me a price for that?

label: Ambiguous (Something wrong)
transcript: The floor in my bathroom feels soft and I think there might be a leak but I'm not sure.

label: External (Guttering)
transcript: My gutters are full of leaves and there is grass growing out of them. It's a two story house.

label: Locksmith (Lost Keys)
transcript: I've lost my keys and I'm locked out of my shop. It's a roller shutter door.

label: Tiling (Small repair)
transcript: A few tiles have fallen off in my shower and I'm worried about water getting behind the wall.

label: Fence Repair
transcript: The wind has blown down two fence panels. One is snapped at the post.

label: Door Hanging
transcript: I have 4 new internal doors that need hanging. I've already bought the hinges.

label: Kitchen Silicone
transcript: The sealant around my kitchen worktop is mouldy and peeling off. Needs replacing.

label: Dripping Tap
transcript: My kitchen tap won't stop dripping. It's a mixer tap.

label: Shelving
transcript: I need 6 floating shelves put up in my alcoves. I have the shelves already.

label: Curtain Rails
transcript: I need some heavy duty curtain rails fitted in the lounge. The wall is brick.

label: Loft Boarding
transcript: I want to board out my loft for storage. It's about 20 square meters.

label: Picture Hanging
transcript: I have a large collection of art (about 15 pieces) that need mounting securely.

label: Jet Washing
transcript: My driveway is covered in moss and is very slippery. Needs a deep clean.

label: Mirror Mounting
transcript: I have a huge heavy mirror for the hallway. Needs proper heavy duty fixings.
